sqlMap.select:
select id, date_day, pc_day_add, wap_day_add, ios_day_add, android_day_add, day_add_sum, yesterday_add_sum, pc_cumulative_add, wap_cumulative_add, ios_cumulative_add, android_cumulative_add, day_cumulative_sum, yesterday_cumulative_sum, day_active, pc_daypay_add, wap_daypay_add, android_daypay_add, ios_daypay_add, daypay_sum from tj_member
order by $orderByClause$

select id, date_day, pc_day_add, wap_day_add, ios_day_add, android_day_add, day_add_sum, yesterday_add_sum, pc_cumulative_add, wap_cumulative_add, ios_cumulative_add, android_cumulative_add, day_cumulative_sum, yesterday_cumulative_sum, day_active, pc_daypay_add, wap_daypay_add, android_daypay_add, ios_daypay_add, daypay_sum from tj_member where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into tj_member (id, date_day, pc_day_add, wap_day_add, ios_day_add, android_day_add, day_add_sum, yesterday_add_sum, pc_cumulative_add, wap_cumulative_add, ios_cumulative_add, android_cumulative_add, day_cumulative_sum, yesterday_cumulative_sum, day_active, pc_daypay_add, wap_daypay_add, android_daypay_add, ios_daypay_add, daypay_sum) values (#id:BIGINT#, #dateDay:TIMESTAMP#, #pcDayAdd:INTEGER#, #wapDayAdd:INTEGER#, #iosDayAdd:INTEGER#, #androidDayAdd:INTEGER#, #dayAddSum:INTEGER#, #yesterdayAddSum:INTEGER#, #pcCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, #wapCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, #iosCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, #androidCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, #dayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#, #yesterdayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#, #dayActive:INTEGER#, #pcDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, #wapDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, #androidDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, #iosDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, #daypaySum:INTEGER#)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()

sqlMap.update:
update tj_member
id = #record.id:BIGINT#
date_day = #record.dateDay:TIMESTAMP#
pc_day_add = #record.pcDayAdd:INTEGER#
wap_day_add = #record.wapDayAdd:INTEGER#
ios_day_add = #record.iosDayAdd:INTEGER#
android_day_add = #record.androidDayAdd:INTEGER#
day_add_sum = #record.dayAddSum:INTEGER#
yesterday_add_sum = #record.yesterdayAddSum:INTEGER#
pc_cumulative_add = #record.pcCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#
wap_cumulative_add = #record.wapCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#
ios_cumulative_add = #record.iosCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#
android_cumulative_add = #record.androidCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#
day_cumulative_sum = #record.dayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#
yesterday_cumulative_sum = #record.yesterdayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#
day_active = #record.dayActive:INTEGER#
pc_daypay_add = #record.pcDaypayAdd:INTEGER#
wap_daypay_add = #record.wapDaypayAdd:INTEGER#
android_daypay_add = #record.androidDaypayAdd:INTEGER#
ios_daypay_add = #record.iosDaypayAdd:INTEGER#
daypay_sum = #record.daypaySum:INTEGER#

update tj_member set id = #record.id:BIGINT#, date_day = #record.dateDay:TIMESTAMP#, pc_day_add = #record.pcDayAdd:INTEGER#, wap_day_add = #record.wapDayAdd:INTEGER#, ios_day_add = #record.iosDayAdd:INTEGER#, android_day_add = #record.androidDayAdd:INTEGER#, day_add_sum = #record.dayAddSum:INTEGER#, yesterday_add_sum = #record.yesterdayAddSum:INTEGER#, pc_cumulative_add = #record.pcCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, wap_cumulative_add = #record.wapCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, ios_cumulative_add = #record.iosCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, android_cumulative_add = #record.androidCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, day_cumulative_sum = #record.dayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#, yesterday_cumulative_sum = #record.yesterdayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#, day_active = #record.dayActive:INTEGER#, pc_daypay_add = #record.pcDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, wap_daypay_add = #record.wapDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, android_daypay_add = #record.androidDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, ios_daypay_add = #record.iosDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, daypay_sum = #record.daypaySum:INTEGER#

update tj_member
date_day = #dateDay:TIMESTAMP#
pc_day_add = #pcDayAdd:INTEGER#
wap_day_add = #wapDayAdd:INTEGER#
ios_day_add = #iosDayAdd:INTEGER#
android_day_add = #androidDayAdd:INTEGER#
day_add_sum = #dayAddSum:INTEGER#
yesterday_add_sum = #yesterdayAddSum:INTEGER#
pc_cumulative_add = #pcCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#
wap_cumulative_add = #wapCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#
ios_cumulative_add = #iosCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#
android_cumulative_add = #androidCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#
day_cumulative_sum = #dayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#
yesterday_cumulative_sum = #yesterdayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#
day_active = #dayActive:INTEGER#
pc_daypay_add = #pcDaypayAdd:INTEGER#
wap_daypay_add = #wapDaypayAdd:INTEGER#
android_daypay_add = #androidDaypayAdd:INTEGER#
ios_daypay_add = #iosDaypayAdd:INTEGER#
daypay_sum = #daypaySum:INTEGER#
where id = #id:BIGINT#

update tj_member set date_day = #dateDay:TIMESTAMP#, pc_day_add = #pcDayAdd:INTEGER#, wap_day_add = #wapDayAdd:INTEGER#, ios_day_add = #iosDayAdd:INTEGER#, android_day_add = #androidDayAdd:INTEGER#, day_add_sum = #dayAddSum:INTEGER#, yesterday_add_sum = #yesterdayAddSum:INTEGER#, pc_cumulative_add = #pcCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, wap_cumulative_add = #wapCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, ios_cumulative_add = #iosCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, android_cumulative_add = #androidCumulativeAdd:BIGINT#, day_cumulative_sum = #dayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#, yesterday_cumulative_sum = #yesterdayCumulativeSum:BIGINT#, day_active = #dayActive:INTEGER#, pc_daypay_add = #pcDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, wap_daypay_add = #wapDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, android_daypay_add = #androidDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, ios_daypay_add = #iosDaypayAdd:INTEGER#, daypay_sum = #daypaySum:INTEGER# where id = #id:BIGINT#
sqlMap.select:
select id, date_day, pc_day_add, wap_day_add, ios_day_add, android_day_add, day_add_sum, yesterday_add_sum, pc_cumulative_add, wap_cumulative_add, ios_cumulative_add, android_cumulative_add, day_cumulative_sum, yesterday_cumulative_sum, day_active, pc_daypay_add, wap_daypay_add, android_daypay_add, ios_daypay_add, daypay_sum from tj_member
order by $orderByClause$
limit $pageInfo.start$ ,$pageInfo.pageSize$

SELECT A.day_add_sum,A.day_cumulative_sum,A.dayAddGrowthRate,A.dayCumGrowthRate,ROUND((A.day_cumulative_sum-B.yesterWeekCum)/B.yesterWeekCum*100) AS weekCumGrowthRate,ROUND((A.day_cumulative_sum-C.yesterMonthCum)/C.yesterMonthCum*100) AS monthCumGrowthRate FROM (SELECT tj.day_add_sum,ROUND((tj.day_add_sum-tj.yesterday_add_sum)/tj.yesterday_add_sum*100) AS dayAddGrowthRate,tj.day_cumulative_sum,ROUND((tj.day_cumulative_sum-tj.yesterday_cumulative_sum)/tj.yesterday_cumulative_sum*100) AS dayCumGrowthRate FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') =#yesterday#)A, (SELECT tj.day_cumulative_sum as yesterWeekCum FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') =#yesterweek#)B, (SELECT tj.day_cumulative_sum as yesterMonthCum FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') =#yestermonth#)C

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date,
tj.day_add_sum AS xzyh, tj.day_cumulative_sum AS ljyh
tj.pc_day_add AS xzyh, tj.pc_cumulative_add AS ljyh
tj.wap_day_add AS xzyh, tj.wap_cumulative_add AS ljyh
tj.android_day_add AS xzyh, tj.android_cumulative_add AS ljyh
tj.ios_day_add AS xzyh, tj.ios_cumulative_add AS ljyh
FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#endDate# AND DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#startDate# GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date, tj.day_add_sum AS xzyh, tj.day_cumulative_sum AS ljyh FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#endDate1# AND DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#startDate1# GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') AS date, tj.day_add_sum AS xzyh, tj.day_cumulative_sum AS ljyh FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#endDate2# AND DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#startDate2# GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')

select DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') as date,
tj.day_add_sum AS xzyh, tj.daypay_sum AS ps,
tj.pc_day_add AS xzyh, tj.pc_daypay_add ps,
tj.wap_day_add AS xzyh, tj.wap_daypay_add AS ps,
tj.android_day_add AS xzyh, tj.android_daypay_add AS ps,
tj.ios_day_add AS xzyh, tj.ios_daypay_add AS ps,
tj.day_active, tj.day_cumulative_sum FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')>= #startDate# AND DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#endDate# order by DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') desc LIMIT $pageInfo.start$,$pageInfo.end$
select count(tj.id) FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')>= #startDate# AND DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#endDate#

select DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') as date,
tj.day_add_sum AS xzyh, tj.daypay_sum AS ps,
tj.pc_day_add AS xzyh, tj.pc_daypay_add ps,
tj.wap_day_add AS xzyh, tj.wap_daypay_add AS ps,
tj.android_day_add AS xzyh, tj.android_daypay_add AS ps,
tj.ios_day_add AS xzyh, tj.ios_daypay_add AS ps,
tj.day_active, tj.day_cumulative_sum FROM tj_member tj WHERE DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')>= #startDate# AND DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#endDate# order by DATE_FORMAT(tj.date_day,'%Y-%m-%d') desc
